content: learn how to crochet a beautiful butterfly with this free crochet pattern it is quick easy and perfect for beginners using only basic stitches you ll create a lightweight butterfly appliqué that s ideal for decorating accessories garments or home décor this project is a fun way to use up yarn scraps and add a handmade touch to your next crochet project it works up super fast and it s easy enough for an adventurous beginner as it has a full **step-by-step photo tutorial** exclusively available on my blog here 1 you can also download a **print friendly version** completely free from my ravelry store also there is a **full video tutorial** on my youtube channel here 2 **special thanks to my testers ** *cheryl freeman becky hummel* **difficulty ** advanced beginner **finished size ** 8 cm/ 3 on widest point **materials needed ** 3 mm 5/0 size hook ***hobbii friends cotton 8/4*** in white 01 c1 1 gram 4 metres/4 5 yards ***friends cotton 8/4 print*** in pastel rainbow 24 c2 4 grams 13 metres/15 yards yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers * optional * **us terms** used throughout **no chart/diagram available ** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 https //kamecrochet com/2025/09/26/%f0%9f%a6%8b-free-crochet-pattern-rufflewing-butterfly-easy-beautiful-butterfly-applique/ 2 https //youtu be/3_vr8dttcqk
